text: Thank you, it's cool to hear about your path so far. I am currently based in the NYC area, I live in Hoboken. I do have a lot of experience managing teams of 3 to 10 people and leading the on set supervision. You said you did some freelancing at a small studio, what would you say are the biggest differences you noticed between the small studios and Framestore? Which of the two configuration do you prefer? Which of the two do you feel have more opportunities to grow, more responsibilities and the most creative input?
